name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of July 12, in Lianyungang, Jiangsu, a black car hit pedestrians and electric bikes, injuring many people at the scene.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The police report stated that the incident was caused by improper operation of the driver, resulting in one person seriously injured, three people slightly injured and seven people with minor abrasions.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 12, some parents in Huizhou went to the municipal government to protest against the Huizhou Education Bureau's poor supervision and Zhongkai No. 2 Middle School's failure to comply with the nine-year compulsory education.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the early morning of July 13, the Henan Nanyang Star Dream Animation Festival, which was originally scheduled to be held that day, was forcibly canceled and postponed by local police because it was close to the Two Sessions and there were minors wearing kimonos.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 13th, the seventh anniversary of Liu Xiaobo's death

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 10, Dandong, Liaoning. A man went to the Dandong Yuanbao District Market Supervision Bureau to complain about something, but no one answered the phone. He drove to the Market Supervision Bureau and found that there were no staff handling business during working hours. All staff left their posts and ate in the cafeteria in advance.
On July 12, the official announcement: The inspection team was organized to conduct an inspection, and the accountability procedure has now begun.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of July 12, a robbery occurred in Xiaolin Town, Cixi, Zhejiang. A man rushed into a gold shop with a simulated toy gun, robbed it and fled.
The police reported: There were no casualties at the scene and the suspect has been arrested by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 12, Yueyang, Hunan. Netizens posted a video saying that a fishery law enforcement vehicle got stuck in a mud pit and could not move. Law enforcement officers pushed the vehicle, and many people watched the excitement nearby, but no one came forward to help.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 10, the Chinese Embassy in Japan issued a statement saying, "Our embassy immediately coordinated with the local police to conduct a full-scale search and rescue."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 12, Caixin.com reported: After extensive research, Caixin found that not only road freight, but also edible oil water transportation has mixed transportation chaos.
